message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. This is a great deal considering its value to me. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and I'm willing to negotiate further. However, $8,500 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to drop my price to $9,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I'm getting closer to what I'm willing to pay, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,800. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $8,800 is still below my minimum.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,400. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept, I'll have to move on to another buyer.
